ygData.subject: Re: From the diary of a warrior princess
ygData.msgSnippet: Want to here REALLY rude? On the weekend someone in West Commons decided to kill a hill giant, so he or she KITIE d the hill giant around the zone border.  I
ygData.messageBody:
Want to here REALLY rude?

On the weekend someone in West Commons decided to kill a hill giant, so he
or she KITIE'd the hill giant around the zone border. I have no idea how
many people it killed, it defiantly killed everyone who was at the Orc camp.
My partner and I managed to dodge the giant 3 times, he got us on the 4th
circuit.

Thats just rude, you dont KITE something like a giant, especially when it
resides in a low level zone. I dont mind dieing because of a fight that I
started, but to be kited is just frustrating.
